results.title: Metformin increases pathological responses to rectal cancers with neoadjuvant chemoradiotherapy: a systematic review and meta-analysis
results.text_hl: To summarize the chemo-radio effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @DISEASE_Rectal_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D012004 @@@rectal cancers@@@ with neoadjuvant chemoradiotherapy on pathological response, @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@ regression grade (TRG), and @<m>DISEASE_Ataxia_Telangiectasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001260 @@@T@@@/N downstaging.

citations.NLM: Lai IL, You JF, Tsai WS, Hsu YJ, Chern YJ, Wu MY. Metformin increases pathological responses to rectal cancers with neoadjuvant chemoradiotherapy: a systematic review and meta-analysis World J Surg Oncol. 2023 Jul 26;21(1):224. PMID: 37491250

results.title: The genetic association of the transcription factor NPAT with glycemic response to metformin involves regulation of fuel selection
results.text_hl: GWAS identified SNPs associated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment success at a locus containing the @GENE_NPAT @GENE_4863 @@@NPAT@@@ (nuclear protein, @<m>DISEASE_Ataxia_Telangiectasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001260 @@@ataxia-telangiectasia@@@ locus) and @GENE_ATM @GENE_472 @@@ATM@@@ (@GENE_ATM @GENE_472 @@@ataxia-telangiectasia mutated@@@) genes.

citations.NLM: Chen C, Gallagher JR, Tarlton J, van Aalten L, Bray SE, Ashford MLJ, McCrimmon RJ, Pearson ER, McNeilly AD, Sutherland C. The genetic association of the transcription factor NPAT with glycemic response to metformin involves regulation of fuel selection PLoS One. 2021;16(7):e0253533. PMID: 34197485
